name: Hide from Alpha Worms
description:
Worms have evolved- not the same species as we knew before.

In this world of platformer, your job is to steal the secret hidden Golden Chicken from the Alpha Worms and hide from them by running around and whacking them if they lunge at you. 

If you hold onto the Golden Chicken long enough without getting caught, you will clear the stage and move to the next HQs of these Alpha Worms- similar to capture the flag!

Good Luck Soldier.  

*Made the Girl and Alpha Worms using Aseprite

Controls:

-Arrow keys to Move

-"C" to Whack

-Space to Jump 

-"R" to restart the Stage

-There's up to Stage 4, and you can skip the stage by pressing "Del" (But try your best to survive from them on your own!)
